message:
Good Afternoon guys,

I was asked to buy a good router for the company I'm working at, it's an advertising agency. I did some research generally speaking to choose what's best for the agency.
I saw a number of models but I don't know exactly which fits best. (I am limited to maximum 1.5-2K budget)
I need something with a good range which also accepts a good number of devices because the one we have here is limited to a certain number of devices.

I was thinking about one of those:
https://compume.com.eg/en/linksys/linksys-ea6200-ek-ac900-smart-wifi-router-colinea6200-ek

https://compume.com.eg/en/linksys-x3500-wireless-n-concurrent-dual-band-gigabit-modem-colinx3500-m2

What do you guys recommend?

Thanks :)
story: Alaa M. Abdel-Aziz shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Buy From CompuMe online in Egypt Linksys EA6200-EK AC900 SMART WIFI ROUTER for only 1,305 EGP...
caption: compume.com.eg
description: Shop online Linksys EA6200-EK AC900 SMART WIFI ROUTER from CompuMe, read full specification, different payment methods online payment , cash on delivery , installment, win reward points.

data.message:
I've gone through this road a few months ago, and found out that the tb-link AC family is perfect considering the features you get with the money you pay.
I recommend you to cehck out this model: TP-Link Archer D7 AC1750
youtube unboxing & review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z0uWC8_jWbk
and you can find it in egypt via this link: http://www.egprices.com/en/product/tp-link-archer-d7-ac1750-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-adsl2-modem-router-mycom

Go for linksys for sure ! beside the two models you've mentioned. I think there's EA6900 
http://www.egprices.com/en/product/linksys-ea6900-dual-band-ac1900-smart-wi-fi-gigabit-router-mycom

This is my personal router, absolutely great, I had so many troubles from my previous one, this one is flawless so far.
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BUSDVBQ?psc=1&redirect=true&ref_=oh_aui_search_detailpage
